propList.Name: title
propList.Description: The text shown in the tooltip

propList.Name: align
propList.Description: This value will be merged into placement's config, please refer to the settings rc-tooltip

propList.Name: arrowPointAtCenter
propList.Description: Whether the arrow is pointed at the center of target

propList.Name: autoAdjustOverflow
propList.Description: Whether to adjust popup placement automatically when popup is off screen

propList.Name: defaultVisible
propList.Description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible by default

propList.Name: destroyTooltipOnHide
propList.Description: Whether destroy tooltip when hidden, parent container of tooltip will be destroyed when keepParent is false

propList.Name: getPopupContainer
propList.Description: The DOM container of the tip, the default behavior is to create a div element in body

propList.Name: mouseEnterDelay
propList.Description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is shown on mouse enter

propList.Name: mouseLeaveDelay
propList.Description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

propList.Name: overlayClassName
propList.Description: Class name of the tooltip card

propList.Name: overlayInnerStyle
propList.Description: Style of the tooltip inner content

propList.Name: placement
propList.Description: The position of the tooltip relative to the target, which can be one of top left right bottom topLeft topRight bottomLeft bottomRight leftTop leftBottom rightTop rightBottom

propList.Name: trigger
propList.Description: Tooltip trigger mode. Could be multiple by passing an array

propList.Name: visible
propList.Description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible or not

propList.Name: onVisibleChange
propList.Description: Callback executed when visibility of the tooltip card is changed
